Headline: Update: No Trains Between Garfield and 95th
ShortDescription: Update: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and 95th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and 95th due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and Garfield at this time.

Shuttle buses will be available to provide connecting service from Garfield to 95th.  

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include Green Line rail service. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
